s: I decided to order the MEKO Precision Stylus after researching several other stylus pens on Amazon. This pen received the fewest negative reviews of other brands. The screw-on protective cap is a welcome addition. I have used the fiber tip only as this is the tip I use most often.

The magnetic design at both ends of the phone stylus makes replacing the pen tip easier. When you need to replace the pen tip, simply pull out the magnetic pen tip and replace it. The MEKO stylus is easy to hold, frees your fingers, and protects your screen from scratches and fingerprints.
